readyPrompt: Draw or select line to generate an elevation profile.
readyPromptCreateOnly: Draw line to generate an elevation profile.
readyPromptSelectOnly: Select line to generate an elevation profile.
creatingPrompt-2d: Create elevation profile by clicking in the map to place your first point, use double-click for last point.
creatingPrompt-3d: Create elevation profile by clicking in the scene to place your first point, use double-click for last point.
selectingPrompt-2d: Create elevation profile by clicking in the map to select a line.
selectingPrompt-3d: Create elevation profile by clicking in the scene to select a line.

errors.unknown: There was an unknown error generating the profile.
errors.tooComplex: Profile could not be generated. Input line is too complex.
errors.invalidGeometry: Profile could not be generated. Invalid geometry.
errors.invalidElevationInfo: Profile could not be generated. Elevation options of the line are not supported.
